org.neuroph.contrib.neat.gen.persistence.impl
Class DirectoryOutputPersistence

java.lang.Object
  org.neuroph.contrib.neat.gen.persistence.impl.DirectoryOutputPersistence
All Implemented Interfaces:
Persistence
public class DirectoryOutputPersistence
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistence

An implementation of the Persistence interface that will only persist the changes between successive generations. This is to preserve disk space, as a large population can rapidly generate a lot of data. The actual writing of the data to disk is passed off to a SerializationDelegate to perform, this class is just responsible for managing the saving and loading of the deltas.

Author:
Aidan Morgan
